title: WTB: T209 b/w Contentnea for type collection
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: WTB: T209 b/w Contentnea for type collection
posts.post_content:
I sold off all of mine years ago and just looking for a decent example for my type collection.  Roanoke player would be best but not necessary.  Low grade fine with me.

Eric
No longer have the Bausewein, but still have the other three [URL="http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/T209/index.html"]shown here[/URL].
